package.name: Grizzly_MassEmail
package.summary: Send Promotional Emails to all or selective customer using one click at admin.
package.description:
Customer Mass Email is designed to allow the user to send out updates to select customers using Magento Email templates. Using this extension you can send coupons , news, events and more with a few clicks in the admin panel

Customer Mass Email will help you keep customers up to date on your future plans and upcoming events allowing you to stay connected and maximize revenue without turning to a third party service for Email blasts

Extension Configuration:

  • Enable/Disable Extension
  • Set Email Sender
  • Set Email Template

Installation Steps:

1) After placing a successful order, you will receive a zip file containing the module files.

2) Unzip the file and upload the contents directly to your server under public_html or www folder.

3) After uploading the files, login to the admin panel and go to "System->Configuration".

4) Find "MassEmail Service" under "Grizzly" section and click on it. If you get a 404 error then logout from admin and login again.

5) Go to System -> Configuration Click "MassEmail Service" under the Grizzly section, you will find all the options.
